constraints.grammar: export class LRUCache { constructor(capacity: number); get(key: number): number | null; put(key: number, value: number): void; }

variable_patterns: Use descriptive names for internal data structures (e.g., 'cache', 'map', 'list')

must_use: Hash map for O(1) key lookup
Doubly-linked list or equivalent for O(1) eviction
patterns: Get operation moves key to most recently used position
Put operation moves key to most recently used position
Evict least recently used item when capacity exceeded

complexity_constraints.time_complexity: O(1) for both get and put operations
